text:
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK Exactly. We started on a 15yr plan in 2000, then revised that to add an extra 6 or 12yrs. Now have pushed it to 46yrs (21 we've already had + the new 25yr plan). Guess in 15-20 yrs we'll probably just make a new plan.
😪

@davemh72 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency Look at the name on the cab...it's a Scottish firm...why would a firm bring purely landfill waste down from Scotland when there are plenty of non haz landfills up there ...would cost a fortune.....would like to see the records from that one https://t.co/ySGmX7Z7qC

@CertusCC @EnvAgency @CleanIlkley But that’s how bathing beaches are also sampled, only at a legally designated sample point. You need a grid reference for the point. Any samples taken away from this point have ‘no standing’ in law.
RT @tw33tie1: @RedIndustries2 @WalleysQuarry are grasping at any alternative reason for the H2S emissions at the site even though the waste…

@PersimmonHomes can we get an update on when you’re going to clear your rubbish please. You assured @wiltscouncil #wiltscouncil  that it would be this week (after around a five year wait) but it’s still there.  @OldsarumCR #OldSarum #EnvironmentalHealth @EnvAgencySE https://t.co/VLKsQ3XnkO

@MarkGSuDS @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK 25 year plan - 75% of rivers to be close to a "Natural state" as soon as practicable.

Whatever "natural state" means? The whole statement is total nonsense.
RT @davemh72: @EnvAgency Walleys Quarry are required to keep records so please do look through them . In case of any doubt taken from their…
@EnvAgency Walleys Quarry are required to keep records so please do look through them . In case of any doubt taken from their permit . https://t.co/iUj4M8xOYZ
RT @tw33tie1: @RedIndustries2 @WalleysQuarry are grasping at any alternative reason for the H2S emissions at the site even though the waste…
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency What @DefraGovUK says they should... Focus on other things and kick this into the long grass by was of the 25yr plan.
RT @BAShuntingdon: We’ve started a project installing permanent fishing platforms on Hinchingbrooke Country Park Lake. With the help of @En…

text: @discors1 @ChrisGPackham @MarkAvery @MeganMcCubbin @IoloWilliams2 @WCL_News @RSBenwell @DaveGoulson @isabella_tree @domdyer70 @LGSpace @DefraNature @EnvAgency Hi. Thank you. We have added your suggestion to the agenda for the event 😊👍
@EllieChowns @EnvAgency It’s a shame because this waste product will be like gold once the use of peat has been banned

Don’t just imagine a nature-rich future – demand it! @DefraNature @EnvAgency  join over 50 organisations calling for nature’s recovery to be written into the #EnvironmentBill It only takes one min, will you? #StateofNature https://t.co/bMXWJplojx

urls.description: I’ve joined over 50 organisations calling for nature’s recovery to be written into the #EnvironmentBill It only takes one min, will you? #StateofNature
